original_text: When I told the good news about Jesus Christ to you, I became like a father for you. You may have ten thousand teachers to help you understand the message about Christ. But I am the only person who is like a father for you.
korean_text: 그리스도 안에서 일만 스승이 있으되 아버지는 많지 아니하니 그리스도 예수 안에서 내가 복음으로써 너희를 낳았음이라

sentences.original_text: When I told the good news about Jesus Christ to you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희에게 예수 그리스도에 대한 좋은 소식을 전할 때

sentences.original_text: I became like a father for you
You may have ten thousand teachers
sentences.korean_translation: 너희에게는 만 명의 스승이 있을지 모릅니다

sentences.original_text: to help you understand the message about Christ
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도에 대한 메시지를 이해하도록 돕기 위한

sentences.original_text: But I am the only person
who is like a father for you
